feed.title: Matomo Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Matomo: 5.3.0
entry.content:
Matomo 5.3.0 Changelog

Please use the attached archives for installing or updating Matomo. The source code download is only meant for developers and will require extra work to install it. - Latest stable production release can be found at https://matomo.org/download/ (learn more) (recommended) - Beta and Release Candidate releases can be found at https://builds.matomo.org/ (learn more)
